properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 3 at 9:38AM CST until January 4 at 9:32PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a flood advisory for
the following rivers in middle Tennessee...

Elk River Near Pelham affecting Grundy County

. Recent heavy rainfall of 2 plus inches has put the Elk River Near Pelham above action stage.

The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Elk River Near Pelham
* At 09AM Friday the stage was 11.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* At 11.0 feet...Water begins to inundate low lying wooded and agricultural
areas along the river.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to noaa weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
